div.p: 弓立醫療用品有限公司(SkyPro)是世界級領先的口罩製造廠商，同時也是全球醫用耗材的創新倡導者之一。根據弗若斯特沙利文報告，於2021年按生產收入計，本公司於中國及全球口罩產品市場分別位居第三及第四位，佔據市場份額分別約1.3%及1.1%，而按出口收入計，本公司於中國口罩產品出口市場雄躆第二位，市場份額約1.1%。自2002年在香港註冊成立以來，弓立醫療始終致力於一次性民用口罩、一次性醫用口罩、醫用外科口罩、N95、KN95、醫療耗材等系列產品的研發和製造，依靠自身的技術優勢，本著創新的發展理念，公司先後通過了醫療和工業的生產體系認證，其中包括醫療器械質量管理體系(ISO13485)、醫療器械許可證、美國FDA、FFP2、歐盟CE等認證。我們從2003年開始為香港各大醫療公營機構、政府部門及跨國企業提供醫用耗材。憑藉良好的資源、專業的團隊、精細化的管理、貼心的服務，為廣大客戶提供最有競爭力的產品和服務。公司目前在全球範圍內設立多家辦事中心，銷售服務範圍已擴展至美國、英國及德國等40多個國家和地區。

SkyPro Medical Supplies Company Limited (SkyPro) is a world-leading mask manufacturer and one of the innovative advocates of medical consumables in the world. According to the Frost & Sullivan Report in 2021, in terms of production revenue, we ranked third and fourth in the mask product market in China and globally, accounting for approximately 1.3% and 1.1% of the market share respectively. And in terms of export revenue, we ranked second in the export market of mask products in China with a market share of approximately 1.1%. Since its establishment in Hong Kong in 2002, we had always been committed to the research and development and manufacturing of a series of products such as disposable masks, disposable medical masks, medical surgical masks, N95, KN95, medical consumables, etc. Relying on its own technical advantages, in line with the innovative development concept, we had successively passed medical and industrial production system certifications, including medical device quality management system (ISO13485), medical device license, US FDA, FFP2, EU CE certification, etc. Since 2003, we have provided medical consumables to major medical public institutions, government departments and multinational enterprises in Hong Kong. With good resources, professional team, refined management and considerate service, we provide our customers with the most competitive products and services. At present, we had set up a number of office centers around the world, and the sales service scope has been extended to more than 40 countries and regions such as the United States, the United Kingdom and Germany.
